title: Strengthening HR Management Practice Competencies: Language Education Design Using Systems Thinking and Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and model complex language learning problems using a systems thinking framework.
Learners can visualize feedback structures in language learning environments using system diagram tools (e.g., Causal Loop Diagram).
Learners can derive leverage points (key intervention points) for language education design based on simulation results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
